achievements: One of the most popular and successful actors in Indian cinema

occupation: Founder and Great Khan of the Mongol Empire
achievements: United the nomadic tribes of Mongolia.
Conquered vast territories across Asia and Eastern Europe.
Established one of the largest contiguous empires in history.

occupation: Former Cricketer, Politician, Prime Minister of Pakistan
achievements: Captained the Pakistani cricket team to victory in the 1992 Cricket World Cup.
Founded the Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf political party.
Known for his versatile acting and socially conscious films.
Won numerous awards including the National Film Award and Filmfare Awards.
One of the highest-paid actors in Bollywood.
Known for his action and romance roles.
